forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 69F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 22C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 72F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds with mostly sunny skies by afternoon. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming mostly sunny by afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
